author: danhaywood
msg: updating pom.xml for branch; also updating archetype resources

author: castagna
msg: This is to show the behaviour of Lucene v3.x in relation to read/writes, commits, reopening readers, etc. Ultimately, we want to be able to use LARQ with an RDF  Dataset and keep the Lucene index in synch as triples are added/removed. Ideally, changes should immediately be visible when searching (i.e. near-real-time behaviour, a.k.a NRT).
